text: Why would this be happening on a landing page? The template cant be found and there is no way to change it?

This seems like a bug in the platform... I think what happened is the `label` value of `theme.json` changed, and that has broken the association to the theme/template for a landing page _(appears to be using a cached version of the theme?)_

Is there any way to fix this without me re-deploying and changing the label again _(if that will even work)_?
are you using the CMS Themes on projects way of deploying your theme?
I think so? I use the `hs project upload .` command when updating/deploying
Sounds like it, are you able to re-assign the page to a template that the system can find?
also can you DM me your portal id
it does not give me any option to select a different theme/template... unless there is another place that can be done _(currently in Landing Page > Settings > Template)_.
